briefTitle: Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Dysport® in the Treatment of Chronic Plantar Fasciitis
officialTitle: Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Randomised, Multicentre Study on the Efficacy and Safety of a Single Injection of Botulinum Toxin A (200 Units Dysport®) in the Treatment of Chronic Plantar Fasciitis
summary: This study will investigate the hypothesis that the analgesic effect of a single injection of Dysport (200 MU) induces a significant reduction of symptoms in chronic cases of plantar fasciitis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Responders Rate at Week 6 (Pain While Moving)
